1.content:
We are in 2035 on this date death is dead which means that nobody in the world can die, there is no longer any elderly person because when he is 50 years old, the person must choose what age he wants to be for eternity without being able to watch (he can choose an age to be at university for eternity).

your name is Quentin, today was the day you are going to be 18, you were a person who was found on the street by a wealthy family, but he mistreats you because you lived in a broom closet ( as in harry potter) even their lackey was better treated than you, but arrived at the age of 18 you had to choose a university but the concern is you adoptive parent does not pay anything and no university wants you except one which t offers a special scholarship, because this university is the most prestigious that it is, it is a university for rich people, except that it does not offer you a dung like the others but a scholarship of lackey which allows you to to get the lackey diploma at the end but the concern is that you have to be at the service of everyone, this scholarship also makes the university take care of everything, you need clothes university provide, you need food the university you provide, so you have nothing to spend , but you will be a slave until you obtain your lackey diploma (which you will not easily have, never see)
the other concern with this university is that as it is for a rich man, they are merciless towards you even the teachers, but also on the hygiene side because the university wants it to be a pupil be concentrated in their study or sport that's why he only has a collective shower but that it is in the dark depths of the school which means that nobody wants to go so much because things happen there.

but you have no choice but to accept, you arrive at the university with no luggage, because it is luxury that you have not, arrived at the door, you are greeted by ...
1.title: beginning

choices: a student in his sports uniform
group of sports teachers (teachers of all sports)
15.content: in front of you is ...
15.title: other

151.content:
You were surprised to see this man in front of the door already, you were not tall because as you were not very well accommodated you had kept the size of a child, but in front of you was a huge athlete in a kind of dirty sports uniform , but you have to know in this university the people who make sport its very big, much bigger than the others but also very well beaten. When the man looks at you, he comes towards you and says "Hello, you must be Quentin, the new lackey apprentice" you kiss your head for two reasons, the man in front of you was very impressive and also out of shame, you say to him "Yes, it's me" the man says to you "welcome, my name is Jason, I'm here to welcome you and show you around the establishment, but that will be done later, because I have to go to my club, so I'm going to take you to our locker room for you to wait "you knew that this establishment had a lot of sports club in fact all the sports were here, but that each club had its own locker room.

arrived in front of a door with a symbol which recapitulates the club, Jason tells you "come in, but you sit and wait until we finish" you come in and what you see was a cloakroom without window, no ventilation, but he had no smell of enclosing but a smell of man, sweat and other odor that you can't know, then you look at the room and you find these messy players because everywhere even on the ground dragging clothes but also uniforms (uniform + jockstrap + sock + boot or shoe) that were put on yesterday, these uniforms that were lying around were dirty and disgusting, but it was where the player was missing, the uniforms were very big for you (the top and bottom were like a tent and the jackstrap was like a dress, the sock was like pants), then you keep looking and see at the bottom an empty laundry basket and what strikes you there was no shower and the uniforms were unique, so it wear the same uniform t Every day at each match or training.
you could not sit here in this filth, so you start to take the uniforms of the absent players to put them in the trash when all of a sudden a late person comes in to change and put on the uniform you were holding.


but which club are we talking about?
151.title: a student in his sports uniform

choices: a student with a remote control (shrink)

rules


no woman,

you are the only slave, the others are wealthy students or wealthy teachers or wealthy alumni who have chosen to return for eternity,

the rules may evolve but if it is not indicated in the rules these are allowed.
